content: प्रभा {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To appear, seem. {@--2@} To shine forth, gleam. {@--3@} To begin to become light, begin to dawn; ननु प्रभाता रजनी <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; प्रभातकल्पा शशिनेव शर्वरी <ls>R. 3. 2.</ls> {@--4@} To illuminate, enlighten.

प्रभा {@--1@} Light, splendour, lustre, effulgence, radiance; प्रभास्मि शशिसूर्थयोः <ls>Bg. 7. 8</ls>; प्रभा पतंगस्य <ls>R. 2. 15</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">31</ls>; <ls n="R.">6. 18</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 20</ls>; <ls>Me. 47.</ls> {@--2@} A ray of light. {@--3@} The shadow of the sun on a sun-dial. {@--4@} An epithet of Durgā. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the city of Kubera. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of an Apsaras.
